# Privacy Policy for AppSpace Launcher **Last updated:** August 6, 2025 ## Introduction AppSpace Launcher ("we," "our," or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle information when you use our macOS application. ## Data Collection and Storage ### What We Don't Collect - **No Personal Information**: We do not collect, store, or transmit any personal information about you - **No Usage Analytics**: We do not track how you use the app - **No Cloud Storage**: We do not store any of your data on external servers - **No Network Monitoring**: We do not monitor your network activity ### What We Store Locally All data is stored locally on your Mac and never leaves your device: - **App Preferences**: Your settings, pinned apps, folders, and customizations - **App Icons**: Any custom icons you choose for apps or folders - **Pinned Locations**: Bookmarks to folders you've pinned (stored locally) - **Password Protection**: Any master password you set (stored securely using macOS keychain) ## Third-Party Services ### Apple Services - **App Store**: For app distribution and updates - **StoreKit**: For subscription management (handled entirely by Apple) - **macOS Keychain**: For secure password storage (Apple's built-in security feature) ### No Other Third-Party Services We do not use any analytics services, advertising networks, or other third-party data collection tools. ## Data Security ### Local Storage - All your data is stored locally on your Mac - We use Apple's recommended security practices - Passwords are stored using macOS Keychain encryption ### Network Access - The app only makes network connections for: - App Store subscription verification (via StoreKit) - Opening network locations you choose to access - No data is transmitted to our servers (we don't have any) ## Your Rights Since we don't collect personal data, there's no personal information to: - Access - Correct - Delete - Port to another service Your data is entirely under your control on your local device. ## Children's Privacy Our app does not knowingly collect any personal information from children under 13. Since we don't collect any personal information from anyone, this is not applicable. ## Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by: - Posting the new Privacy Policy on this page - Updating the "Last updated" date ## Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us: - **Email**: [Your contact email] - **GitHub**: [https://github.com/appspacelauncher/appspace](https://github.com/appspacelauncher/appspace) ## Legal Basis This Privacy Policy complies with: - General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) - California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) - Other applicable privacy laws Since we don't collect personal data, most privacy law requirements don't apply to our app, but we're committed to transparency about our practices. --- *AppSpace Launcher is designed with privacy in mind. Your data stays on your device, where it belongs.*
